Text.Page:
Hahia is so thrifty. She doesn't waste a thing. A few days ago, I was training a frog that was captured alive in the Tuwangi Swamp. Well, training it in the town may be dangerous so she laid out an aura here since the yard is large enough and far away enough from the people to train the frog.

That Martin needs to get things done and he is a smart fellow, but he is too afraid of everything. Well, you're welcome to watch but be careful not to get hurt.
